alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:26PM CDT until June 17 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Washita County in western Oklahoma... Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Western Custer County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1026 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Reydon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Cheyenne, Burns Flat, Erick, Sentinel, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Butler, Carter, Reydon, Foss, Sweetwater, Strong City, Retrop, Foss Reservoir, Moorewood, Stafford, and Berlin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills; Washita
